channel.title: I Don't Understand This
channel.description:
so ive been hosting my server for a few months now and everything has been fine for most of it. a few dupers here and there and i find how they were duping and fix it...but now i feel like ive fixed all the dupes yet there has been a crazy amount of dupers in the past 2-3 days...i can't find the dupe they are using and im going crazy. any suggestions?
trisidiax V2 source
also players are coming onto my server and doing what we are calling "Morphing" on my server which is when lets say their character name is "pker123" and theres another player named "ipktoday" then the morpher pker123 can log in and his name will show as the second guy ipktoday...so everyone thinks its the second guy when really its the first...
any suggestions on how to fix both of these guys? :(

item.title: I Don't Understand This
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Find someone that is duping and have it so all of that player’s actions are placed in a text file. It’d look something like this.
NOTE: Don’t copy and paste this and expect it to fully work.

[code=java]
public void traceDupe(){
BufferedWriter bw = null;

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“whatever”)){
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(
new FileWriter(“config//tracedupe.txt”, true));
bw.write(“Have it print actions here.”);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) {
try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sM(“Error while writing.”);
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

Call the void where the actions are executed from.

Read full topic
